name: Dark Guardian
description: This is a stylesheet for the Guardian - UK newspaper ( http://www.guardian.co.uk ), changing the background from glaring bright white to soothing, cool black and adding a silly little phrase to each of the headlines for no reason at all. I am igor at http://techlorebyigor.blogspot.com and I code dark styles for several web sites. Wherever there is white, let us replace that with black. Note: I do not interfere with advertising. My focus here is on adjusting the brightness, nothing else.

user.name: amethyst_igor
user.about: There is no end and no beginning, because there is light in the darkness and it renews all things. Life and death are not serious alternatives. We derive from and merge into the light through eternity, so there is no end to us and no beginning.

additional_info:
This is a combination of the Dark Guardian and "With His ......" stylesheets, along with additional refinements by me.

Version 2.0 darkens the background in the Guardian's "live updates" articles.

Isy Suttie is a hottie.
